name: Unbinary
description:
Unbinary is a VR hand-painted puzzle adventure that will immerse you in an unusual moment in human history. Webby, the super AI that was elected to rule planet Earth, needs to be audited, and it is your role to assure she is ready for her duty.

Features


  • 100% hand-painted inside VR with Oculus Quill, enabling a futuristic, comic-book-inspired dystopic universe.
  • Impactful narrative develops as you get deeper into Webby, the sarcastic super A.I. who is way too sure about who she is.
  • Physics-enabled interactive levels allow you to dive into the mysterious Webby and realize the world is in some serious trouble.
  • How you look changes how the world reacts: 3 different embodiments offer varied physical interactions in VR.
